main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in Cincinnati, Ohio on August 20, 1968, observing the phenomenon for 15 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO was described as two round reddish-orange objects, appearing to be hovering., The objects seemed bright and luminous, with one appearing larger than the other., The estimated size of the objects was approximately 50-100 ft in diameter., The objects hovered for about 5 minutes before gradually climbing and flying out of sight to the southwest., The report stated that the observation was not detailed enough for a scientific investigation, and further information was requested from the observer.
